verses.verse: You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a sharp <S%H2299><s%> sword; <S%H2719><s%> You shall take <S%H3947><s%> it as a barber <S%H1532><s%>'s razor <S%H8593><s%> to you, <S%H5674><s%> and shall cause it to pass on your head <S%H7218><s%> and on your beard: <S%H2206><s%> then take <S%H3947><s%> balances <S%H3976><s%> to weigh, <S%H4948><s%> and divide the hair. <S%H2505><s%>

A third part <S%H7992><s%> you shall burn <S%H1197><s%> in the fire <S%H217><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> when the days <S%H3117><s%> of the siege <S%H4692><s%> are fulfilled; <S%H4390><s%> and you shall take <S%H3947><s%> a third part, <S%H7992><s%> and strike <S%H5221><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it; <S%H7992><s%> and a third part you shall scatter <S%H2219><s%> to the wind, <S%H7307><s%> and I will draw out <S%H7324><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> after them. <S%H310><s%>
You shall take <S%H3947><s%> of it a few <S%H4592><s%> in number, <S%H4557><s%> and bind <S%H6696><s%> them in your skirts. <S%H3671><s%>

Of these again <S%H3947><s%> you shall take, <S%H7993><s%> and cast them into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> them in the fire; <S%H784><s%> from it shall a fire <S%H784><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> into all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> This is Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> I have set <S%H7760><s%> her in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and countries <S%H776><s%> are around her. <S%H5439><s%>

She has rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against my ordinances <S%H4941><s%> in doing wickedness <S%H7564><s%> more than the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and against my statutes <S%H2708><s%> more than the countries <S%H776><s%> that are around <S%H5439><s%> her; <S%H3988><s%> for they have rejected my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and as for my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> they have not walked in them. <S%H1980><s%>

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because you are turbulent <S%H1995><s%> more than the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are around <S%H5439><s%> you, <S%H1980><s%> and have not walked in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> neither have kept <S%H6213><s%> my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> neither have done <S%H6213><s%> after the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are around you; <S%H5439><s%>

therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Behold, <S%H6213><s%> I, even I, am against you; and I will execute judgments <S%H4941><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
I will do <S%H6213><s%> in you that which I have not done, <S%H6213><s%> and whereunto I will not do <S%H6213><s%> any more the like, <S%H3282><s%> because of all your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

Therefore the fathers <S%H1><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you, <S%H1121><s%> and the sons shall eat <S%H398><s%> their fathers; <S%H1><s%> and I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on you; <S%H7611><s%> and the whole remnant of you will I scatter <S%H2219><s%> to all the winds. <S%H7307><s%>

Therefore, <S%H2416><s%> as I live, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> surely, <S%H2930><s%> because you have defiled my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> with all your detestable things, <S%H8251><s%> and with all your abominations, <S%H8441><s%> therefore will I also diminish <S%H1639><s%> you; <S%H5869><s%> neither shall my eye spare, <S%H2347><s%> and I also will have no pity. <S%H2550><s%>

A third part <S%H7992><s%> of you shall die <S%H4191><s%> with the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and with famine <S%H7458><s%> shall they be consumed <S%H3615><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you; <S%H7992><s%> and a third part shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> you; <S%H7992><s%> and a third part I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> to all the winds, <S%H7307><s%> and will draw out <S%H7324><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> after them. <S%H310><s%>

Thus shall my anger <S%H639><s%> be accomplished, <S%H3615><s%> and I will cause my wrath <S%H2534><s%> toward them to rest, <S%H5117><s%> and I shall be comforted; <S%H5162><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in my zeal, <S%H7068><s%> when I have accomplished <S%H3615><s%> my wrath on them. <S%H2534><s%>

Moreover I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a desolation <S%H2723><s%> and a reproach <S%H2781><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are around <S%H5439><s%> you, <S%H5869><s%> in the sight of all that pass by. <S%H5674><s%>

So it shall be a reproach <S%H2781><s%> and a taunt, <S%H1422><s%> an instruction <S%H4148><s%> and an astonishment, <S%H4923><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are around <S%H5439><s%> you, <S%H6213><s%> when I shall execute judgments <S%H8201><s%> on you in anger <S%H639><s%> and in wrath, <S%H2534><s%> and in wrathful <S%H2534><s%> rebukes; <S%H8433><s%> (I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have spoken it; <S%H1696><s%>)

when I shall send <S%H7971><s%> on them the evil <S%H7451><s%> arrows <S%H2671><s%> of famine, <S%H7458><s%> that are for destruction, <S%H4889><s%> which I will send <S%H7971><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> you: <S%H3254><s%> and I will increase the famine <S%H7458><s%> on you, <S%H7665><s%> and will break your staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread; <S%H3899><s%>

and I will send <S%H7971><s%> on you famine <S%H7458><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%> animals, <S%H2416><s%> and they shall bereave <S%H7921><s%> you; <S%H1698><s%> and pestilence and blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> you; <S%H935><s%> and I will bring the sword <S%H2719><s%> on you: <S%H3068><s%> I, Yahweh, have spoken it. <S%H1696><s%>
